sys_template.name: Big Idea Inquiry
sys_template.template: assignment_group=d625dccec0a8016700a222a0f7900d06^category=inquiry^close_code=Solution provided^close_notes=Please see contest rules and instructions provided.^contact_type=phone^impact=3^short_description= How do I participate in the Big Idea contest?^state=1^urgency=3^comments=Go to the Employee Center Portal, and search for Big Idea. Select the Big Idea catalog item. Fill out the form and submit. You are allowed to submit as many ideas as you would like. The contest will be open until the first of next month. At that time, IT will prioritize the submissions and announce the top 5 winners. Each of the top 5 winners will receive a $100 gift card. Good luck!^EQ
